title: 441: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 8 (MEN TELL ALL aka The Long Ad)
itunes:title: 441: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 8 (MEN TELL ALL aka The Long Ad)
description:
The Broads recap the “Men Tell All” from Gabby and Rachel’s Bachelorette season! They chat about Aven’s hometown date and then dive into the MTA which was just one giant advertisement that included no rose ceremony!
